taskDescription: Using divisibility rules, determine if 43,568 is divisible by 4.
detailedSolution: The number formed by the last two digits of 43,568 is 68 and 68 is divisible by 4. Since the number formed by the last two digits of 43,568 is divisible by 4, so is 43,568.
